      Methods in model with parameters of type Ball 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Circuit.addBall(Ball b) 
      private int Quadtree.getIndex(Ball ball)
      This method returns the sub-area in which the Ball is located in. 0 : top-right corner 1 : top-left corner 2 : bottom-left corner 3 : bottom-right corner If Ball is in more than one sub-area, it is then considered as in parent sub-area and -1 is returned.
      void Quadtree.insert(Ball ball)
      This method inserts a Ball in the Quadtree.
